A law like this will only serve to increase the amount of people willing to make that straw purchase, especially since their cut will now be higher as they will be more in demand.  Denver's gun control laws say in part:
 "It is unlawful for any person engaged in the business of selling handguns to sell, rent, exchange, or deliver any handgun having a melting point of less 1,000 degrees Fahrenheit, or tensile strength of less than 50,000 lbs. per square inch, or metal having a density of less than 7.5 grams per cubic centimeter."
